EmailTemplate.name: Property Lead - Auto Response
EmailTemplate.subject: EOI Application - AUTO RESPONE
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Name}
Thank you for submitting your application to trade at the Queen Victoria Market.
The application will be assessed and we endeavour to notify every applicant of the progress of your application as soon as possible,
In the meantime, visit our website www.qvm.com.au for further information on trading at the market and events taking place at the Queen Victoria Market.
Sincerely, Property Department Queen Victoria Market
